item.description:
Make new friends and connect with old, find resources, create alliances, or just soak in the lively chatter and good cheer. If you’re new to Hidden-Tech, this is a great opportunity to introduce yourself and find out what we’re all about.


Refreshments: cheese/fruit/crackers and vegetable crudite with herb dip will be served--drinks and sandwiches can be purchased at Coolidge Park Bar and Café
Suggested donation at the door: Complementary - bring your good cheer and money for drinks
Parking: ample free parking behind the Hotel Northampton
item.why: Say goodbye to the winter doldrums and join your fellow Hidden-Techies for a social gathering at the scenic Coolidge Park Cafe bar at the Hotel Northampton.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Hidden-Tech Presents: A Winter Social
